analysis.description:
Allocation.unlock (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#664-675) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensCreated == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol:
	Contract Allocation has payable functions:
	 - unlock (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#664-675)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TLCMarketCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#814-827):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(address(allocation),distributionSupply) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#820-821)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributionSupply (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#822-823)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#374-390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#386)

Allocation.unlock (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#664-675) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tlc.transfer(founderStorageVault,tokensCreated) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#674)

TLCMarketCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#716-751) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#748-749)

TLCMarketCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#814-827) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(address(allocation),distributionSupply) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#820-821)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#826-827)

Reentrancy in TLCMarketCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#716-751):
	External calls:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#747)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#747-748)

Allocation.founderStorageVault should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#645-651)
TLCMarketCrowdsale.minContribAmount should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#695-696)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe0e85967afcb4c6cd4f696b58f24f96456591db1.sol#1): it allows old versions
